name: NewtonZero
description: Example with Newton root-finding method.

name: NewLanguage
description: Example with new language features.

name: RecSim
description: A problem of recommendation systems, with consumers and providers.

name: RaceCar
description: A simple continuous MDP for the racecar problem.

name: PowerGen_continuous
description: A continuous simple power generation problem loosely modeled on the problem of unit commitment.

name: PowerGen_discrete
description: A simple power generation problem loosely modeled on the problem of unit commitment.

name: HVAC
description: Multi-zone and multi-heater HVAC control problem

name: Reservoir_continuous
description: Continuous action version of management of the water level in interconnected reservoirs.

name: Reservoir_discrete
description: Discrete version of management of the water level in interconnected reservoirs.

name: Elevators
description: The Elevator domain models evening rush hours when people from different floors in a building want to go down to the bottom floor using elevators.

name: PropDBN
description: Simple propositional DBN.

name: Traffic
description: BLX/QTM traffic model.

name: UAV_continuous
description: Continuous action space version of multi-UAV problem where a group of UAVs have to reach goal positions in the 3d Space.

name: UAV_discrete
description: Discrete action space version of multi-UAV problem where a group of UAVs have to reach goal positions in the 3d Space.

name: UAV_mixed
description: Mixed action space version of multi-UAV problem where a group of UAVs have to reach goal positions in the 3d Space.

name: MarsRover
description: Multi Rover Navigation, where a group of agent needs to harvest mineral.

name: CartPole_continuous
description: A simple continuous state-action MDP for the classical cart-pole system by Rich Sutton, with actions that describe the continuous force applied to the cart.

name: CartPole_discrete
description: A simple continuous state MDP for the classical cart-pole system by Rich Sutton, with discrete actions that apply a constant force on either the left or right side of the cart.

name: SupplyChain
description: A supply chain with factory and multiple warehouses.

name: SupplyChainNet
description: A supply chain network with factory and multiple warehouses.

name: Wildfire
description: A boolean version of the wildfire fighting domain.

name: MountainCar
description: A simple continuous MDP for the classical mountain car control problem.
